title: Mariupol steelworks: 'We have wounded and dead inside the bunkers'
description: One of the last defenders in Mariupol tells the BBC conditions are dire but they won't surrender.

title: Mariupol: Satellite images suggest mass graves dug near besieged city
description: The satellite images appear to show more than 200 graves, as Ukraine accuses Russian troops of mass killings.

title: Ukraine round-up: Putin backs off storming of Azovstal as Mariupol 'mass graves' found
description: Russia's president says the Azovstal steel plant must be sealed off, and satellite images suggest mass graves.

title: The German towns in Paraguay with a surge in European immigrants
description: Thousands of German nationals have migrated to Paraguay to escape Covid restrictions and immigration in Europe.

title: Juan Orlando Hernández: Honduran ex-leader extradited to US
description: Former President Juan Orlando Hernández is accused of involvement in a cocaine trafficking ring.

title: Have we seen peak Netflix?
description: The streaming giant is losing subscribers despite huge hits like Squid Game and Bridgerton.

title: Afghanistan: 'Blood and fear everywhere' after deadly IS blast
description: Dozens of people are dead or hurt in four blasts in Afghanistan, two claimed by the Islamic State.

title: Ukrainians injured or killed by unexploded ammunition
description: Across Ukraine’s Kyiv region, efforts have begun to clear the countless pieces of unexploded ammunition left behind after fierce fighting.

title: Haiti: Small plane crashes on to main road killing six
description: The pilot is among those who died when the aircraft came down in Haiti, injuring people on the ground.

title: Sophie Wilmes: Belgian foreign minister resigns to care for sick husband
description: Sophie Wilmes will temporarily resign to care for her husband who has been diagnosed with brain cancer.

title: Florida lawmakers have stripped Disney of special tax status
description: Governor Ron DeSantis has taken aim at Disney over its opposition to the so-called Don't Say Gay bill.

title: Rare tiny Brontë book could set $1.25m sale record
description: The world's first tennis guide and Amy Winehouse's library are also on offer at the NY Antiquarian Book Fair.

title: Rudy Giuliani revealed on The Masked Singer TV show
description: The appearance of Donald Trump's former lawyer prompted one of the show's judges to walk off.

title: Russia releases video of intercontinental ballistic missile launch
description: President Putin says the new Sarmat missile is food for thought for those who try to threaten Russia.

title: Mid-day meal plan struggles to feed India's hungry students
description: The world's most ambitious free school food programme resumes post pandemic, but problems remain.

title: Why Argentina is embracing cryptocurrency
description: The nation that has seen economic trauma is open to the possibility of alternative money like Bitcoin.

title: What weapons has the US given Ukraine - and how much do they help?
description: President Biden has announced a new $800m assistance package that includes ammunition and drones.

title: The young rebels fighting for democracy in Myanmar
description: The BBC gained rare access to Myanmar's jungle training camps where protesters are turned into soldiers.

title: French election: Le Pen impresses but Macron holds firm in TV debate
description: Marine Le Pen's last presidential debate was a disaster - but five years on things are different.

title: Struggling to survive in cash-starved Afghanistan
description: Eight months into Taliban rule, the economy and health services have been shattered as funding dries up.

title: France election: What far-right leader Marine Le Pen said before… and now
description: Has Marine Le Pen's strong views on immigration, the EU and Nato shifted since the last election?

title: Jacinda Ardern on China, Aukus and leadership
description: New Zealand's PM sat down with the BBC to discuss everything from China to her wedding.

title: The Zomato and Swiggy riders risking their lives to deliver food in 10 minutes
description: The BBC followed overworked delivery riders as they raced against time to take food to customers.

title: Climate change, albinism and me
description: Coco shares her experience of living with albinism in Nigeria.

title: Wayne Quilliam: Photographing the diversity of Aboriginal Australia
description: Australia has hundreds of Indigenous groups - and Wayne Quilliam is hoping to photograph them all.
